ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: he will have a most pleasant life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He is therefore in the desired bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will live a pleasant life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He shall live a pleasant life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will live a pleasant life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: will have a most pleasing life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He shall be in a lifewell-pleasing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: he will have a pleasing life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Will be in a life of good pleasure and satisfaction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He will live a pleasant life (in Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: shall live in a life which is pleasing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will be in a pleasant life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will be in a pleasant life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [101:7] he will enjoy a pleasant life, in Paradise, that is to say, a pleasing one, for he will be pleased with it, that is, it will be pleasing to him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will live a pleasant life) He will be in a pleasant Paradise, pleasing to himself.
